author: Ellie Harrison, Ellie Harrison
title: Frankie Boyle condemned for 'sick' coronavirus death toll jokes
description: Comedian has been posting about fatalities in Britain and Boris Johnson's hospital stay
content:
Frankie Boyle has sparked a backlash on Twitter after posting a series of dark jokes related to coronavirus.
The comedian, who is known for his gallows humour, has drawn criticism for his recent tweets about the coronavirus death toll, Boris Johnsons struggl… [+1196 chars]
